Package es.udc.cartolab.gvsig.navtable

Class Summary
AbstractNavTable AbstractNavTable is the base class that defines the layout of the window that allows to navigate between the elements of the layer.
AttribTableCellRenderer With this class, the navTable first column text is forced to be bold.
NavTable NavTable's main panel is a two-column table that shows data row of the layer.
NavTableModel The model of the table to be shown.
ToggleEditing Class for start, stop or toggle the editing on a vector layer.
